resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.body:
Andreas

Please remember to use the wiki markup provided to make your ticket more readable.

Have you tried using underscores or dashes rather than dots?

Cheers
Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket.
